item.title: 1.2 Functions
item.description: Soda Vending Machine Japan Coast, photo by slackrhackr Introduction On a vending machine each button corresponds to a particular snack inside the machine. The item you get depends on the button you push. When you press the button for a soda the machine should dispense that soda, if it is functioning properly. The linking of each button to only one snack is the idea behind a mathematical function. The Definition of a Function While no single formal definition can capture the full extent of the function concept, it is still important to start with a working definition.
